example.text: How do you look at this graph and decide that the best solution is to do nothing? (Hint: the answer is NRA $$$) [[url]]

Infrastructure Law brings Transportation Funding Dear Friend, Last year I proudly voted to pass the bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act, which has funded over 38 projects so far in the 6th District . These 38 projects include ADA and traffic safety improvements, intersection upgrades, the buildout of pedestrian paths, and projects to make transportation easier, safer, and smarter.

Through the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act, CSX is the lead railroad on the CREATE project, the largest federal investment in passenger rail since the creation of Amtrak. It also includes new resources for the Surface Transportation Board to hold freight railroads accountable and improve passenger rail on-time performance.

So if you all are afraid of free markets, if you want to destroy workers' pensions, if you oppose individual freedom, if you want to force your constituents to invest in proven losers, then please vote for this resolution. Be honest about your values.

Through the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act, CSX is the lead railroad on the CREATE project, the largest federal investment in passenger rail since the creation of Amtrak. It also includes new resources for the Surface Transportation Board to hold freight railroads accountable and improve passenger rail on-time performance.
The US has the ability to lead the world in transitioning to cleaner, cheaper energy sources. I explained what’s standing in our way in my [[user]] op-ed. ? ? [[url]]
